elements.name: Verify Get /intensity endpoint responds successfully - Happy Path

steps.name: I have endpoint for "carbonintensity" domain
I call "GET" http method on "/intensity" endpoint
I should get status code as 200

steps.name: Json schema of "/intensity" response is as expected
Response header is "Access-Control-Allow-Origin" of type "String.Class"

elements.name: Verify GET /intensity endpoint returns only 1 object

steps.name: I have endpoint for "carbonintensity" domain
I call "GET" http method on "/intensity" endpoint
I should get 1 carbon intensity object in response

name: Get Carbon Intensity data for current half hour. All times provided in UTC (+00:00)

steps.name: I have endpoint for "carbonintensity" domain
I call "GET" http method on "/intensity/date" endpoint
I should get status code as 200
Json schema of "/intensity/date" response is as expected

name: Get Carbon Intensity data for today. All times provided in UTC (+00:00)
